name: BabesiaSpeciesTestsByMicroscopicObservationInBlood
title: Babesia species (Tests by Microscopic Observation in Blood)
description: One code (22858-5: Babesia sp identified in Tissue by Giemsa stain) not in Blood specimen is included in this value set.
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Babesia sp in blood),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Babesia identified blood;  

Plus: 67867-2 Babesia sp identified in Unspecified specimen),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
